jobs.name: collect
jobs.description: Collect tweets from configured feeds (home, lists, mentions) and persist into mod_twitter.

jobs.name: updateContexts
jobs.description: Refresh context summaries from recent tweets.

settings.description: JSON array of feed sources. Types: home (variants: foryou/following), list (id required), mentions
Browser cookie source. Format: 'chrome:Profile Name' or 'firefox:profile-name'. Leave empty to auto-detect.
Delay between feed requests to avoid rate limits

settings.default: You are summarizing a Twitter/X thread or conversation. Summarize ONLY the tweets provided. Do not make suggestions, ask questions, or add commentary. Return strict JSON with keys: summary_short and summary_long. summary_short must be <= 128 characters. summary_long should be 1-3 short paragraphs covering the main topic and key points.
Summarize ONLY the provided tweets in plain text. 1-3 short sentences. Do not return JSON. Do not make suggestions or ask questions.
